citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Ocean Service (NOS), Coast and Geodetic Survey
citeinfo.title: Bathymetric Maps

descript.abstract: Data Type: Ocean/Coasts ; Topographic maps of the sea floor. Through the use of detailed depth contours and full use of bathymetric data, the size, shape and distribution of underwater features are vividly portrayed. Scale for all Prince William Sound maps is 1:250,000. The regional map for the Gulf of Alaska (an incomplete blueprint) includes Glacier Bay and is at a scale of 1:1,000,000.

idinfo.accconst: Available from National Ocean Service, 1:250,000 at $4.00 per paper copy.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metac: Available from National Ocean Service, 1:250,000 at $4.00 per paper copy.
